message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, it is worth $12,000 to you. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $10,500. This special offer is designed to help you save while ensuring you receive the best value for your investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
